A Chrome extension enhancing privacy in OpenAI's ChatGPT client.  🛡️  Enables users to easily hide and unhide chat history 🛡️  Operating directly in-browser without accessing or storing chat data. 🛡️  Ideal for maintaining privacy during screen shares  🛡️  Contributions are welcome!
